name: MediQuest (Code Blue Studios)
description:
Hello!

We are Code Blue Studios, a student group of aspiring game developers that got together through UBC's Game Development Club. This is our first test demo for Mediquest, a game that we all envisioned together.

By hearing the stories of different patients, you will perform diagnoses and hopefully learn a thing or two, both medically and about the personal struggles of people's lives. We hope you enjoy testing out this demo, as short as it is!

Thank you :)

Follow our development on Twitter @codebluestudios

We do not claim to be medical professionals, but we consult med students as well as residents so as to be responsible and avoid spreading misinformation. For the purpose of gamification and pacing, the diagnosis tree has been simplified. All assets, including art and sound, have been made by our team - with the exception of a few that are 100% royalty-free.
